item.title: EP 78 - Ghost Hunting At The Stanley Hotel
item.itunes:title: Ghost Hunting At The Stanley Hotel
item.description:
Today you cut me some slack!

Links:

The Story Of Gef

http://gefmongoose.blogspot.com/p/the-story-of-gef.html

The Stanley Hotel

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Stanley_Hotel

You should probably avoid staying at The Stanley Hotel, inspired by The Shining, if you're afraid of ghosts

https://www.buzz.ie/weird/avoid-staying-at-stanley-hotel-inspired-by-the-shining-if-afraid-of-ghosts-270423

The 7 Most Haunted Spots in The Stanley Hotel

https://www.tripsavvy.com/the-haunted-stanley-hotel-4108817

‘Ghosts’ Caught On Camera At Famed Stanley Hotel In Colorado

https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/stanley-hotel-little-girl-ghost_us_59d70686e4b072637c431df7

Spirits of the Stanley Hotel: Ghost of “Lucy” Photographed at Haunted Hotel That Inspired “The Shining”

http://weekinweird.com/2015/08/19/spirits-of-the-stanley-hotel-ghost-of-lucy-photographed-at-haunted-hotel-that-inspired-the-shining/

The Strange Hauntings of the Historic Stanley Hotel

https://www.strangerdimensions.com/2016/04/25/stanley-hotel-haunted/

---------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
